title: (20800) Zarautz - 24 Zuberoa Kalea
description: Zarautz municipal pool, everything very clean, good service.

title: (20800) Zarauz - 16 Araba Kalea
description: Blue zone parking in front of a medical center. Free public toilets at the crossing

title: (20800) Zarautz - 6 Aiziazpia Kalea
description: Free area to spend the day in Zarautz. 15 minutes walk to the center.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 1 Urteta Bidea
description: Industrial area, with drinking water and black and gray water vacuum services and replenishment. Stone floor and white powder. Next to the highway.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 2T Lugar Geltoki Ingurua
description: Newly built district, the blue lines show that you have to pay between 9-20. Zarautz seemed overwhelming to find parking, but this was a nice spot not in the masses, but still in the center.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 15 Hegoalde Kalea
description: Shop to buy all kinds of gas for motorhomes/Campers

title: (20800) Zarautz - 41 Araba Kalea
description: Eroski car park. 2 hours parking for free.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 8 Kasino Kalea
description: Paid parking across the street. We arrived at noon and spent one night. The price is quite expensive. Even so, the night went well, the place is quiet and close to the beach.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 906 Kalea Mitxelena
description: Gravel parking, paid, 800 m from the beach, no service

title: (20800) Zarautz - 43F Kalea Araba
description: Ecolaundry a little more expensive than the others and the most used washing machine, but it is possible to park, it is the eroski parking with camper area

title: (20800) Zarautz - 6 Iturribidea Kalea
description: Large parking lot next to the center, 3 min walk. supermarket and bar next door. nice place to explore center. paid parking.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 28 Iturribidea Kalea
description: Parking space in a quiet residential area for 20 euros/24h. About 7 minutes from the beach and 3 minutes walk from the old town. Plenty of parking available but often occupied. Good chances of getting a parking space, especially in the morning and afternoon. Lots of police presence, felt very safe there.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 43J Araba Kalea
description: Perfect to spend day and night. Cordon parking. Blue zone that is only paid from June 1 to September 30. Next to police. During the week noisy from 8am.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 23 San Frantzisko Kalea
description: Bathrooms and showers. from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 27C Gipuzkoa Kalea
description: Parking space along a road. Paid during the day. Several toilets nearby and beach nearby.

title: (20800) Zarauz - 21 N-634
description: Parking possible during the day. 2 minutes to the beach. Were there in the low season, in the high season you need a lot of luck.

title: (20800) Zarautz - Buztinzuri Kalea
description: Parking along the road at the edge of residences. Attention white bands = reserved to the residents therefore risk of fine. blue line = other authorized parking. beach Zarautz 20 minutes walk. max length: 7 m (beyond you go over the road). Noisy area because close to a major axis.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 9A Nafarroa Kalea
description: They are public bathrooms provided by the town hall. It is supposed to cost to go to the bathroom and to take a shower, but there is no one. They are nothing special but they are not bad at all and on the first line of the beach

title: (20800) Zarautz - 926 Indamendi Kalea
description: Free parking from September to June, quiet, good place to sleep in a van, there is a 2m barrier that prohibits the entry of tall vehicles. In summer you pay.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 25A Nafarroa Kalea
description: Public bathrooms with shower and changing room on the beach promenade. Open from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m. Gratuitous.

name: Camping Talai-mendi
title: (20800) Camping Talai-mendi
description: Camping Talai-mendi! Created in terraces, overlooking the sea, a few places for large campers, young audiences and many surfers with VW Bullis

title: (20800) Zarautz - 630 Asti Auzoa
description: Parking under the AP-8 to one side of the football field. the only drawback is the noise from the cars passing over the bridge

title: (20800) Zarautz -
description: Beautiful dirt parking for about 10 vehicles facing the Cantabrian Sea and surrounded by trees. Public toilets and fountain right next door. Sun the first hours of the day and the rest total shade.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 26 Azpeiti Bidea
description: Parking lot

title: (20800) Zarautz - 901 Asti Auzoa
description: Parking of a football stadium. At the foot of the 4 lanes. A 30 minute walk to the beach of Zarautz (10 minutes by bike). Picnic area near the parking. The police let us parked for lack of a campsite (all full).

title: (20800) Zarautz - 3 Talaimendi Auzoa
description: On the Mirador de Zarautz, on the edge of the road behind the garbage containers, place for at least 5 vans or cars with a view of the sea,

title: (20800) Zarautz - N-634
description: Parking between Zarautz and Getaria, ideal to spend a night in front of the sea. We sleep in the shade of two beautiful trees. There is room for six vans (shade for three, the rest in the sun). The bad thing is that it is next to the road and in the morning cars pass by, but at night they hardly pass by.

name: Gran Camping Zarautz
title: (20800) Gran Camping Zarautz
description: It's on a hill = great views of the coast and Zarautz! Very clean toilets and showers. easy reservation, great extension. 15 minutes from the beach (down 439 steps / 100 meters in altitude) with a wonderful view of the pretty town with a beautiful promenade. The terrain slopes gently far into the sea and is therefore ideal for children!

title: (20809) -
description: Quiet site with picnic tables and a barbecue. Surrounded by nature.

title: (20809) Gipuzkoa - GI-2631
description: Very nice parking lot for a break. Unfortunately with a height limit of 1.85 m. There is space for 1-2 larger cars in front of it. Lots of shaded picnic tables and playground. Also a good place to start hikes.

title: (20810) Orio - Barreiatua
description: Large unpaved parking, isolated and quiet. A walk takes you to the marina and the lighthouse. Very nice and quaint. The beach is closed, it is not accessible .. glass box.

title: (20810) Laurgain - 19Y Vial Camino Laurgain
description:
Parking 4 places for the night. seen on the river, but close to a busy road. relatively quiet night (just a dog barking all night)
good for a stopover

title: (20810) Orio - 16 Baxoalde Kalea
description: Large public car park next to the estuary promenade, a playground and an Eroski. Spacious with many seats and several vans sleeping. We spent a quiet night from Saturday to Sunday. Public toilets on one side

title: (20809) Aia - 1 Ubegun Industrigunea
description: Day/night parking exactly on the opposite of the cheapest gas station in the area. Not romantic but ok go an overnight stay.

title: (20810) Orio - 13 Estropalari Kalea
description: Parking under highway bridge a bit noisy but perfect for spending the night. From 8:00 p.m. free. Beautiful to visit the surroundings, parks for children.

title: (20810) Aia - 57 Olaskoegia Auzoa
description: It is a quiet parking lot, it does not put in any carter forbidden to park to sleep, I suppose that being a town and being far from the city there is no problem. A very quiet place near the Orio town, a place with a lot of charm. We spent the night and rested very well.

title: (20810) Orio - 39 Abaromendi Kalea
description: The parking space of the mobile home is payable. Paying to park under a road bridge, located at a roundabout, quite noisy. The view of the nearby marina and proximity to the beach make up for that, so overall ok. The services are free - many thanks to the municipality for that.

title: (20810) Orio - 913 Calle Antilla
description: Beach parking, blue zone but on an esplanade where it is quiet and two minutes walk from the beach there is a bar with a very good atmosphere. The cool cool. Next to a park of ducks and roosters. Of course, you can hear the rooster sing

title: (20808) Getaria - 918 Sahatsaga Ibilbidea
description: Parking of a residential area. Parking allowed EXCEPT from June 1 to September 30, which is only for residents. There is a sign indicating it at the entrance.

title: (20809) Aia - 11 Urdaneta Auzoa Barreiatua
description: Parkingplace at side of the road. Bit noisy of cars coming by. But beautifull view in the morning of zarautz.

title: (20810) Orio - 12 Ibai-Ondo Ibilbidea
description: Self-service laundry

title: (20809) -
description: Toilets closed. don't crap around the place it's really disgusting. small effort to buy a (foldable) spade and dig yourself a pit in the woods.

name: Orio Kanpina
title: (20810) Orio Kanpina
description:
Small campsite with swimming pool. Sea at 200 meters. Super equipped, very clean with all the comfort and necessary possible including mini-market and restaurant! acsi card accepted. friendly staff and near the village on foot 10 mins.

discount card is not accepted in july and august

title: (20808) Guetaria - Agerre-Goikoa Baserria
description: Parking overlooking the beach and the port, at the entrance of Getaria arriving from Zarautz. Height limited to 1.90m. Tap on the beach (foot wash), as well as toilets and showers (I do not know what are the opening times). Close to restaurants and grocery stores (5min walk). Free parking from 8pm to 10am. Arrival at 21h and distributed early aprem the next day. I spent a very quiet night, far from the crowd of Zarautz, in my expert Peugeot. Some walkers / runners who spend the morning and evening and some people on the beach.

title: (20810) Orio - 7 Diseminados S-2 Barreiatua
description: Showers and public toilets

title: (20810) Orio - 6 Antilla Kalea
description: Park and stay overnight in quiet cul-de-sac. Only 100m to the sea and sandy beach. We were there during the Pentecost holidays. Almost empty beach. Cold shower on the beach. Toilets open on the beach in high season. Bar / coffee 50m on the beach. Free parking between 8pm and 8am. Otherwise parking fee - is checked regularly. Parking spaces are about car length. VW T4 with rear box is almost too long.

title: (20809) Aia - 1 Arratola Aldea Auzoa
description: Parking under train station right next to the bridge that leads to the bar area. Suitable for vans. Public bath in the same street. Gratuitous.

title: (20808) Getaria - 12 Aldamar Kalea
description: Parking next to the Red Cross. you need to enter from the back of the town to avoid the 1.9m height restriction but it's no problem to arrive. right on the beach, with no problems. no servies. but great peacadaria.

title: (20808) Getaria - 905 Lugar Barrio San Prudentzio
description: Parked here for a night. 5 minute walk to cafes and seafront. Flat and peaceful. Good for a night, windy in the morning. Great sea view. Would suit vans and small motorhomes.

title: (20808) Getaria - 26 Portua Kalea
description: Limit to 1.90m high. Ten places on the quay, quiet, close to the center of this big village. Access direction Port, right when we go to Bilbao

title: (20810) Orio - 44 Abaromendi Kalea
description: Municipal parkplace with dedicated places for camping-cars. Good access to the beach, restaurant nearby.

title: (20810) Orio - 901 Etorbidea Aita Lertxundi
description: Unlimited public parking, in front of the river, public bathrooms leaving the parking lot towards the river promenade next to the exercise machine park.

title: (20808) Getaria - 22 Portua Kalea
description: A standing room with a direct sea view. A little louder during the day, but it calms down at night so that you can sleep comfortably. In 400 meters you will find a very clean and quiet beach with beach showers and toilets, as well as the city center.

name: Camping Zingira
title: (20809) Camping Zingira
description: Very quiet, surrounded by nature, with lots of shade, large separate plots with hedges, very attentive staff, very clean bathrooms. Very recommendable but expensive.

title: (20808) Getaria - 20 Igarategi Industrialdea
description: Free quiet place in industrial area to spend a night without a view of anything

title: (20810) Orio - Barreiatua
description:
Along a small quiet road and the river.

/!\ Saw a police car during the day who told us not to spend the night there.

title: (20809) Gipuzkoa - GI-2631
description: On a hill, but we managed to sleep very well for one night. Light traffic during the night.

title: (20808) Getaria - 23 San Prudentzio Auzoa Auzoa
description: Small seaside car park, for day parking

title: (20810) Orio -
description:
Very quiet place and spectacular location
Along the way there are areas where you can park well

title: (20810) Orio - Lugar Ortzaika Aldea, 901
description: 10 dedicated motorhome spaces provided by council in small car park just of main road. No black or grey dump but steps down to River and a drinking water fountain. Very handy base to walk or cycle along pretty river path to Orio town or on further to beach.  2 night max stay. Restaurant and waste bins opposite.

title: (20808) Getaria - N-634
description: A0 a night without problems.

title: (20810) - 18W Lugar Ortzaika Aldea
description: Parking on the right from St Sébastien between the wine cellar and a restaurant opposite the parking below, already mentioned

title: (20809) Aia - 15 Joan Etorle Kalea
description: Children's playground, Parking hosteleria

title: (20808) Getaria - 13W Askizu Auzoa
description: Accessible motorhome between Getari and Zumaia by going on Zumaia on the left magnificent view, 5/6 places until when? ... Because already some present waste, stable ground

title: (20808) Askizu - 37A Askizu Auzoa Auzoa
description: Ideal to spend a night and watch the sunset. Nice walks around seeing all kinds of farm animals. With children Ideal. They fit several motorhomes and campers.

title: (20759) Zumaia - 924 Artadi Auzoa
description: Unrestricted parking, free of charge. Noise from the main road at night, but bearable. Great view!

title: (20808) -
description: Roadside with great views of zamaia and the ocean. little traffic but recommended earplugs

title: (20749) Aizarnazabal - 16 Zubialdea Auzoa
description: Very quiet parking area First we asked a local who told us that there was no problem. In the park in front there is a drinking water fountain, a picnic area and even a public barbecue

title: (20750) Zumaia -
description: Free and quiet parking with public toilets

title: (20750) Zumaia - 15 Basusta Bidea
description: Industrial estate, quiet area. Many motorhomes throughout the estate.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 15 Basusta Bidea
description: Good parking under the entrance to the Camping. We spent the night, being a weekend we have had no problems.

title: (20808) Getaria - N-634
description: Roadside parking with views of Zumaia and the ocean. For one night. A little passage and the sound of the waves, but the view on waking is pretty

title: (20808) Getaria - N-634
description: Place on the side of the road. With beautiful view and sound of sea.

title: (20808) Guetaria - N-634
description: Parking next to the road. Space for 3 vehicles. We have made the night with a motorhome and everything is perfect! The sound of the waves incredible!

name: Camping & bungalows Zumaia
title: (20750) Camping & bungalows Zumaia
description: Zumaia, 16 Basusta Bidea. Camping & Bungalows Zumaia. New campsite

title: (20750) Zumaia - 6 Trenbide Pasealekua Hiribidea
description: Aire in industrial site. Stayed on a Sunday so quiet until 10pm then the night shift started, what a noise, hardly slept a wink the whole night.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 52 Santiago Auzoa Auzoa
description: Slightly sloping roadside parking. Direct access to the beach. Somewhat narrow access but we entered well with the motorhome. At night little noise from cars. In the morning they were noticeable more, from 7 or 8 hours.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 48 Santiago Auzoa Auzoa
description: Vague lot big enough to be quiet away from the road in the background. To troubleshoot for one night.limit at 2 meter

title: (20750) Zumaia - 25 Urola Enparantza Plaza
description: Good place to park in an industrial area next to the cycle path that takes you to the center. Night possible without problem, calm will not be at the meeting before 10:30 p.m. Water point at the entrance to the station tunnel. 4G goes well, SFR and Bouygues.

title: (20750) Zumaia - GI-3811
description: Parking with some shade. no height limitation. not recommendable for long camping cars.

title: (20810) - 8 Lugar Benta Aldea
description: Orio-Igeldo picnic area, we stopped for the dogs, it is a picnic area, today it is raining and there is fog, but you can see the sea. on an asphalt road , narrow but in good condition, there is enough space for a motorhome. Very quiet and very close to San Sebastián. There are tables to eat and a grill in the middle. also toilets, but today they are closed.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 5 Urola Enparantza
description: Parked by the river to the rear of an industrial site , rubbish bins available

title: (20750) Zumaia - 1 Estazioa Kalea
description: Parking lot at the train station. Well (not suitable for filling the water tank) and waste paper basket a few meters. The center of the city is a 3 - 5 minute walk away. Parking is free all day.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 27 Patxita Etxezarreta Kalea
description: Quiet parking near the town center, about 200m to the path of the Flish and the hermlta. You have to pay from 10am to 8pm. Large ACs enter, without difficulty in maneuvering

title: (20750) Zumaia - 917 Sagarbidea Bidea
description: Quiet parking.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 7 Victoriano Arrate Hiribidea
description: 2 water fountains in the pedestrian zone, resident parking.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 1 Izaga Kalea
description: Laundry, cheap and good place to park. Around there are bars and supermarkets. In less than an hour you have clean and dry clothes. I recommend 100%

title: (20750) Zumaya - 45 Santiago Auzoa
description: Area in the same port of Zumaia to park, free and with space for large motorhomes. You can stay overnight. The car park is connected to the town by a bridge and can be reached in 5 minutes. At the end of the car park, a boat leaves every 20 minutes that connects the port with the city center for 0.55 cents.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 1 Juan de Zigaran Kalea
description: In winter you can park here for free. Right on the boardwalk.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 6 Mari Kalea
description: Public parking Blue area of payment from 10:00 to 20:00, a place to sleep quietly, it is the full promenade but from 22:00 to 09:00 there is no movement of people and few vehicles. in the center, we asked the local police and they told us that as long as we didn't take anything outside, we could sleep without problem. public baths at 200m, breakfast bars at 50m.

title: (20750) Zumaia - 1 Sagarbidea Bidea
description:
Stable parking lots of passage, access to the center on foot to 500 m, the beach to 2000 m.
Forbidden 15June to 15 September 10:00 - 20:00

title: (20750) Zumaia - 15 Basadi Auzategia Auzoa
description: Showers

title: (20008) Donostia -
description: 4x4 access only. Wilderness bivouac under pine trees. 10 meters from a winding and brittle path. Superb ocean view.

title: (20740) Zestoa -
description: Nice view, fountsin is down on Road but when Drive Up u see, some tablets and chairs, calm place at night

title: (20750) Zumaia - 13 Narrondo Auzoa
description: A very neat source to fill tanks with drinking water (I think) for free. It is in a Cepsa service station.

title: (20749) Iraeta - 906 Sabea Kalea
description: Next to a football field without shade but very quiet to sleep and bike and walk across the river and a picnic area that you can eat well.

title: (20170) Aginaga - Unnamed Road
description: Amazing Spot near San Sebastián.. ocean’s view

title: (20740) Zestoa - 5 Manuel Uztapide Plaza
description: Municipal sports center of the town. Very friendly people, clean facilities

title: (20749) Gipuzkoa - 928 Arroako Industrialdea
description: Ample parking near a polygon, very quiet with hardly any traffic

title: (20170) - 902 Lugar Barrio Urdaiaga
description: Parking next to a river in a small village. Railway tracks next door. A lot of nature.

title: (20740) Zestoa - 1 Lugar Alonderoko Aldapa
description: Rich flowing drinking water source, you can fill water bottles here. The locals do this too.

title: (20740) Zestoa - 911 Toribio Altzaga Kalea
description: Service area very quiet, very close to the city center, free drain, 8 km from the beach of Zumaia by bus or bike path. Cave with rock paintings near the area.

title: (20008) Donostia - 151 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea
description: Small area at the end of a dead-end track near the summit of a hill. Surrounded by antennae but otherwise a great view.

title: (20740) - 12W Bainuetxeko Errepidea
description: Parked here to eat and walk the dog.

title: (20749) Zestoa - 10Y Endoia Diseminados Auzoa
description: Magnificent panorama over the valley and the ocean, the car park is at the end of the road just next to the antennas. no services.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 906 Lugar Barrio Urdaiaga
description: Shaded picnic area

title: (20170) Usurbil - 13 Urdaiaga Auzoa
description: Very quiet picnic area with about 15 relatively level places for motorhomes <6m. Approach relatively steep but fixed. Great view of the hilly landscape. Very quiet except for the nearby church bell.

title: (20159) Asteasu - GI-2631
description: Zona de picnic

title: (20170) Usurbil - 4 Errekaldea Kalea
description: Behind an industrial area along the river ... has very quiet shade. Perfect for a picnic pose I think we could spend the night there but not tempted ..

title: (20170) Usurbil - 3 Diseminados Usurbil Barreiatua
description: Water fountain and 10 parking spaces

title: (20829) Deba - 8 Elorriaga Auzoa
description: Good place to spend a night. There is water, toilets and a food truck (in season). Extremely busy area with locals during the day and campers at night. almost too much. Spectacular views of the mountains and the sea. Access road a bit steep but accessible for all heights (only part of the car park is limited to 1.9m). NO shower! not a straight surface. Really uneven. Only 1 night per 15 days. Maximum camper 5.50 m long. Please take the length seriously - you are endangering yourself and others (especially in high season and when maneuvering in the dark at night!)

title: (20809) Aia - 12A Iruretaegia Auzoa Auzoa
description: Wonderful starting point for hiking and mountaineering. Lots of local walkers on weekends. Deafeningly quiet at night. Flat asphalt to stand on. Sun and shade.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 911 Paseo Gernika
description: Parking in the center of town, in front of the sports center. It has several places. We have spent the night without any problem. Next there is a dog camp. Source outside the sports center.

title: (20749) Zestoa -
description: While searching for one of the already available places in park4night, which were all crowded, we found this tiny little space at the side of a conjunction. Good for one night with a quite nice view. Very quiet. Police came by in the morning and was very friendly (we said we are going to leave soon).

title: (20829) Deva - Mardari Auzoa
description: Small car park surrounded by nature with a great view of the mountains

title: (20170) Usurbil - 38 Kalezar Auzoa
description: Quiet place next to a soccer field to park and spend the night. It is ideal if you want to enjoy Guipuzcoan gastronomy, since it is at the entrance of the Sidrería Saizar.

title: (20008) Donostia - 69 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea
description: Annex to the campsite for motorhomes and campers. Ask at the We camp camping reception. It is not always open. Grassy area. Shims may be needed to elevate depending on the plot. Spaces a little fair for large motorhomes. Something cheaper than camping pitches. To take the public bus from the campsite stop, download the d-bus app and it will tell you the bus arrival time at the stop. Very practical.

name: wecamp San Sebastian
title: (20008) wecamp San Sebastian
description: wecamp San Sebastian, located about 300 meters above sea level. In part of the campsite there are mobile-homes and plots for campers and glamping tents. The plots are 60m2 where all types of caravans and motorhomes fit. Plus and Premium pitches include electricity.

name: Camping Igara
title: (20018) Camping Igara
description: Small camping. the equipment is paid : pool, weight room, sauna and hammam (we have not tried). The pitches are small.

title: (20829) Deba - 24W Itsaspe Auzoa
description: Parking where the path to visit the Flisch begins. parking that authorizes overnight stays but to take into account the following limitations: - only ONE night is allowed (every 15 days) - it is forbidden to remove awnings and chairs - park correctly using only one space. ATTENTION! keep the area clean! The car park DOES NOT HAVE SERVICES, but they are about 100 meters walking along the path at the end, where the toilets and picnic tables are. Drinking water tap (only for bottles), garbage cans. The arrival at the car park is along an asphalt road, the important thing to keep in mind is that the road has a LOT of SLOPE. From there you can start the path to the views of the coast, the flysch, and take a dip in the sea. quiet night, with one of the most starry skies!

title: (20008) Donostia-San Sebastian - 904 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea
description: Parking next to the cemetery, slightly sloping, great view, next to the road.

title: (20159) Asteasu - 6 Eliz Kalea
description: Quiet, parking in the Center of Asteasu.

title: (20829) Deva -
description: We spent the night here, a motorhome, a camper and a van. I leave you an image so you can see how we put it, leaving space in the middle to eat in peace. The firm is made of stones. The train passes below, but you can hardly hear it. Quiet place to sleep. Next to start the route. If you follow the path down, the vehicle can be turned around as there is room for it.

title: (20008) Donostia - 2 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea
description: Fairly large and quiet parking lot, sea view.

title: (20008) Donostia - 1 Lizardia Enparantza
description: Parking next to a school. It's Sunday and the patio is open, it has swings. Shadows and very quiet. On the street below, a children's park and toilets.

title: (20159) - 910 Zilar Kalea
description: Parking of all kinds of vehicles, on the outskirts of town. With shadow. Silent A route leaves right next to

title: (20159) Asteasu - 7 Ibarrazpi Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Ideal place to rest and spend a weekend to discover their customs and gastronomy. Car park. From the village you can go hiking in the mountains such as "Ernio" ... a real luxury.

title: (20829) Deba - Itsaspe Auzoa
description:
Small parking to spend the night or to go down to the beach. It has beautiful views of the meadows with cows and their calves, and the sea in the background. Very nice, the only bad thing I can say is that it has few places (6), in which without inclination there are only 2. And that there is no garbage (which can be harmful if people do not respect the environment) .
Highly recommended.

title: (20159) - 909 Lugar Zizurkil Nucleo
description: Parking at the entrance of Zizurkil Arriba. Very quiet, next to a church and the road. Few noises at night, cars do not usually pass, except at rush hour when there is a bit more hustle and bustle. Have we ever seen motorhomes stay overnight as well. Good views.

title: (20170) Donostia - 6 Arrapide Pasealekua
description: Large free parking with shade located 200 m from the town next to horse race track. Only busy on race days. Cycle path to cycle the 8km to San Sebastian beach but this town has plenty of shops and bars anyway.

title: (20170) Lasarte-Oria - 923 Lugar Barrio Txikierdi
description: This free parking space for 4 caravans is located next to Urbil Shopping Centre in Usurbil. It's open from 9:30am to 24:00am.

title: (20749) Endoia -
description: Good for 1 night

title: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 3 Hipodromo Etorbidea-Avda del Hipodromo Hiribidea
title_short: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 3 Hipodromo Etorbidea-Avda del Hipodromo Hiribidea
description: LavaXpres self service laundromat. Washing 30min small 4.5e big 8e. Drying 30min small 4.5e big 5.50e. Detergent and softener 0.5e each or bring your own. Open every day 8-22.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 25 Izarraitz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Very ample parking at the edge of the road to rest, spend the night or something on the way.

title: (20170) Lasarte-Oria - 81 Arrapide Pasealekua
description: Galp gas station with showers

title: (20170) Donostia - 14 Abalotz Errepidea
description: Gas station with shower available, just ask for the key at the cash desk at the express junction.

title: (20829) Deba - 32 Itsaspe Auzoa
description: Quiet place nice landscape good for hiking or relaxing! there is no beach near and no way to get to the ocean but to sleep a night its perfect! only minus no toiletts or shower opinion!

title: (20018) Donostia - 46 De Errekalde Hiribidea
description: Small parking near the Mercadona and McDonald. Free for night.

title: (20018) Donostia - 84 Illarra Bidea
description: Free parking spaces along the road where you can also park with a long camper. Far from the center, it is only good if you don't know where to go.

title: (20018) Donostia - 107 Illarra Bidea
description: Calm, place for a night when the favourite parking is full. Street is closed by some long time construction work so no traffic. Very quiet.

title: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 8 Oria Etorbidea
description: No picture and it's really a shame. SUPER STOP BATHING so I recommend! Just go up the river via the small park, go under the 4 lanes and we land on a beautiful spot for swimming in the wilderness in 5 minutes walk from the car park. Not tested to spend the night but parking that seems quite discreet and protect from the road by a building.

title: (20018) Lasarte-Oria - Fernando Mugica Kalea
description: We only had dinner here after going to the nearby supermercado and then moved on. But it seemed like a good place to sleep. It’s a giant parking lot in front of the Decathlon.

title: (20018) San Sebastián - 49 Calle de Lautximinieta
description: Free street parking. At night it is emptied of vehicles. Quiet area, few cars at night.

title: (20018) Donostia - 61 Arturo Campion Kalea
description: Fallback of the place by the park is full. Yet, literally nothing around. Parking quite even, fully empty.

title: (20018) Donostia - 28 Loistarain Kalea
description: Quiet dead end with green areas and quiet little houses. Few places but if you have the chance to find one, we spend a great night just a stone's throw from the bay with our electric bikes.

title: (20829) Deba - 36A Itsaspe Auzoa Auzoa
description: A gas station service area with shower. Perfect for a warm shower.

title: (20494) Alkiza - 15E Alkiza Plaza
description: Spacious and quiet parking next to the cemetery of the village of Alkiza. there are beautiful views of the valleys and Basque hamlets and Mount Ernio

name: Camping & Bungalows Itxaspe
title: (20829) Camping & Bungalows Itxaspe
description: Deba, 16 Itsaspe Auzoa. Very clean facilities. Citystade, ping-pong tables, barbecues etc .. Stunning views of the cliffs. Very calm and very friendly reception.

name: Area Autocaravanas Donosti
title: (20018) Area Autocaravanas Donosti
description: Donostia-San Sebastián motorhome area. A large space and well connected to the center of Donosti with the 5 or 25 bus and to the center of San Sebastian with the 33 bus.

title: (20829) Deba - 911 Itsaspe Auzoa
description: Quiet place next to the road and in front of a restaurant, to do night is fine. a tad inclined but without problems.

title: (20829) Itziar - 906 Mutxiarte Kalea
description: Location at the entrance of Itziar, recently paved, with spaces just wide enough for AC. Attached to the road, although not with much traffic. For a night on the road or visiting the town, perfect

title: (20008) Donostia - 2 Kristobal Balenziaga Kalea
description: Spot for van without amenities because impossible to park in Donostia San Sebastián. Direction Igeldo, parking near the Hotel Leku Eder Possibility to take a shady path to reach the beach approx 1.7 kms or bus

title: (20018) Donostia - 1 Manuel Lardizabal Ibilbidea
description: Excellent day and night paid parking when the parking area is full. Recommended by locals

title: (20018) San Sebastián - 1 Plaza de Elhuyar
description: The local air just down the road was packed at 4pm and many campers were parked here. Parking under the trees, approx 3m max.

title: (20018) Donostia - 3 Zuatzu Kalea
description: Industrial estate, very quiet

title: (20018) San Sebastián -
description: San Sebastian city, blue zone free parking

title: (20018) Donostia - Olarain Kalea
description: Street location near Ondarreta to sleep peacefully

title: (20018) Donostia - 70 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Motorhome, Van and car parking in service road. No view but good access to San Sebastián.

title: (20018) Donostia - 70 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Motorhome, Van and car parking in service road. No view but good access to San Sebastián.

title: (20018) Donostia - 24 Ondarreta Pasealekua
description: Good place to stand, day or night. Also for bigger things. With luck a lot of shade. At night without a ticket.

title: (20018) Donostia - 928 Etorbidea Tolosa
description: Free parking "Igara" for vans. height limit 1 m 90 Bus stop right next door: bus 5. 25 . 45 . takes you to Ondareta beach and La concha (10 minutes.) on foot 2 kms 300 places approximately quiet

title: (20018) Donostia - 72 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Parking space for paid city tour but plenty of space and camper, flat spot no service

title: (20150) Zizurkil - 17 Ernio Bidea
description: Quiet parking for the night and day. gravel parking, is level, has street lighting and garbage containers. shops, bars and square 100 meters

title: (20018) Donostia - 81 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Laundromat next to the motorhome area in San Sebastian. Nice waiting area with chairs, tables, coffee machine and snack vending machine.

title: (20140) Andoain - 1 Sorabilla Auzoa
description:
Parking in the polygon,
access to the town in 5'.
No services.
Close to the highway, a bit noisy.
Little fuss on the weekend,
midweek things will change!!!!

title: (20018) Donostia - 14 Ondarreta Pasealekua
description:
Parking on the street pay parking meter. Residential and quiet area. 500 metres from the beach and 2 km from the Centre of the city. 
Street parking. Residential and quiet area. 500 meters from the beach and about 2km from the city center

title: (20018) Donostia - 11 Zarautz Kalea
description: Paid but inexpensive parking. Around 3km from the center lais with line 5 you arrive directly in the old town. Forbidden to sleep there at night, noisy with the road next to it.

title: (20829) Lastur - 6 San Nikolas Plaza
description: Public parking. The site is spectacular in the middle of nature. Respect the environment and neighbors.

title: (20820) Deba - N-634
description: Parking from a point of view. We slept without problems, at night almost no cars pass and the views are spectacular.

title: (20140) Andoain - Txistoki Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Very quiet parking in town. Good access from the N1 and easy to park. Services of all kinds within walking distance (supermarket, greengrocer, butcher, cafeteria...) Perfect for spending a night, stocking cupboards and getting to know Andoain and the Leizaran natural park and its 25 km greenway by bike. You cannot park on Tuesday and Saturday mornings as there is a market.

title: (20720) Azkoitia - 97 Madariaga Auzoa
description: Free car park, only for small camper-van because of narrow access

title: (20150) Villabona - 7C Agaraitz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Cepsa service station. Open 24 hours. Small Carrefour supermarket and clean toilets. Showers

title: (20008) Donostia - 20 Igeldo Ibilbidea
description: Great place if you are lucky enough to find free to leave the camper and enjoy the beach or a trip around the city.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 20 Loiolako Inazio Hiribidea
description: Small car park next to a monument and away from the main street. The neighbors park their vehicles and motorhomes there. Very close to the Loiola Sanctuary. We were quiet despite our proximity to the city.

title: (20720) Azkoitia -
description: Amazing place by the road. it is a green grass esplanade with space for many motorhomes. At the foot of the road, but it does not bother. incredible views and several fountains with drinking water. Lots of space and silence. Very easy access. Perfect to spend 2 or 3 nights.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 902 Bidea Loiolako Ignazio Hiribidea
description: Quiet parking in a residential area and close to a walk from the town in one direction and from the sanctuary in another. We were there during the day but there are no prohibitions on spending the night.

title: (20820) Deba - Km. 41 N-634
description: Free drinking water

title: (20008) Donostia - 6 Wiesbaden Kalea
description: Quiet parking in a residential area, it is located 3 minutes from the beach and the showers place.

title: (20140) Andoain - 19 Kale Nagusia Kalea
description: DO Laundry self-service laundry

title: (20160) Gipuzkoa - 13W Bidea Illarraltzueta
description: Parking at the back of the cemetery. Slight slope.

title: (20130) Urnieta - 33B Barrio Ergoyen
description: Fantastic parking lot with stunning views. Although the track may seem narrow, it is still as it was at the beginning. it does not shrink at any time.

title: (20140) Andoain - 2 Txitibar Plaza
description: Self-service laundry with washing machines and dryers. There is also a dog washing station. Open Monday to Sunday 8AM-22PM. Supermarket, bars and restaurants around.

title: (20820) Deba - N-634
description: Parking with panoramic view.

title: (20008) Donostia - 9 Eduardo Chillida Pasealekua
description: Street in front of the sea. Water available right in front of the beach and shower available on the beach (cold) or for a fee otherwise in toilet area.

title: (20018) San Sebastián - Lugaritz Pasealekua
description: Free daytime parking ideal for visiting the beach with the possibility of spending the night only parking

title: (20150) Villabona - Legarreta Auzoa
description: Beautiful, quiet park with shops and bars to visit, bike path and the train station nearby to visit San Sebastian.

title: (20008) Donostia - 1 Beatriz infantaren kalea
description: Parking, quiet quiet street not bad. Bicycles advised.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 26 Loiolako Inazio Hiribidea
description: [EUSKAL HERRIA ezagutzen] This is the school car park. Next to it there are tables and benches where you can eat... There are public toilets and a water tap. Don't forget not to throw any trash on the ground, let's take care of the environment! See you soon!

title: (20150) Villabona - 35X Lugar Barrio Otelarre
description: Esplanade of land next to the door of the Hika Winery. The winery is visited and they are very friendly. Space for more than 20 vehicles with no clearance limit.

title: (20730) Azpeitia -
description: New filling and emptying area (gray and black) in Azpeitia. Overnight accommodation is allowed (3 nights maximum).  It is right next to a large field with picnic tables, etc. A bit out of the center, but to be free ...

title: (20140) Andoain - 15 Extremadura Kalea
description: Parking without services in the upper part of Andoain. Level. Very calm. Easy access. Close to the cycle route.

title: (20008) Donostia - 4 Ondarreta Pasealekua
description: Public baths / showers hot water. Located below the promenade. WC FACILITIES: 11 (1 disabled) Urinals: 4 Showers: 32 (hot water) 1 for disabled people Lockers: 214 (5 disabled) Rental of shower towels: Yes First aid kit: Yes. HOURS June-September: from 9: 00h. at 8:00 p.m. July-August: from 9:00 a.m. at 8:30 p.m. April-May-October: 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Rest of the year: 10:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

title: (20009) San Sebastián - 5 Paseo Bascongada
description: You can park for free along the road

title: (20820) Deba - N-634
description: Parking by the road with a view of the sea.

title: (20720) - 113 Lugar Barrio Madariaga
description: Quiet place and outside the parking lot, in the shade for hot days. The point is not very well located, after the edge of the curve a path appears on the right.

title: (20009) Donostia - 172 Oriamendi Pasealekua
description: Place to sleep quietly very close to the Museu Chillida Leku. The area is video monitored, there is a height limit of 2.20m and the upper seats are almost flat, so we have not even leveled the van.

title: (20009) Donostia - 14 Hegaztien Pasealekua
description: Free parking. Next to the Atletico San Sebastian stadium. Without service

title: (20008) Donostia - 5 Pío Baroja Pasealekua
description: Large public paid roadside parking area on the whole street. Space for vans & camping cars.

title: (20009) Donostia - 172 Oriamendi Pasealekua
description: Gravel parking next to the Ekogune park. Perfect to visit.

title: (20120) Hernani - 5 Santa Barbara Auzoa
description: Nook at the edge of a busy road. A wooden bench to enjoy the view. Sloping. No services. Close to the Santa Bárbara climbing spot. Noise from the highway but light at night depending on your insulation. Other nooks are accessible all along the road to the hermitage (chapel). Some a little flatter near the retaurant, for some less sheltered from the wind but with fewer trees hiding the view;)
